channel.title: Sig & User Bar
channel.description:
I was bored today and decided to try to make a pretty descent user bar for this website, because I noticed that there aren't any (that i've seen). Also, the sig I made a long time ago so tell me what you think of both of them.
[IMG]http://i53.photobucket.com/albums/g62/Omfgurweird_83/User%20Bars/MoparIsTheBestUserBar.jpg[/img] This is the start of it, no animation.
[IMG]http://i53.photobucket.com/albums/g62/Omfgurweird_83/User%20Bars/MoparIsTheBest-User-Bar2.gif[/img] Decided to try to animate it a lil bit. Change the color every 2 seconds :P
[IMG]http://i53.photobucket.com/albums/g62/Omfgurweird_83/Signatures/mopar4.gif[/img] Like I said, made this a LONG time ago.
So all in all, tell me what ya think about the user bars and which you think is better. You can use them if you want. Enjoy!
~GoD

item.title: Sig & User Bar
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

Eh the text on the userbars throws the whole thing off. I suggest you change it, otherwise nice job.

item.title: Sig & User Bar
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

I like the animation. Good Job, I like the third one the best.

If you don’t mind, can you tell me how you made it? I want to get into photoshop, but I have been too busy with school.

Read full topic
